just just forget it this I'm going to change carriers

If you can't give me a better deal i might have to leave TELUS
Your services are no longer satisfying, is there something you can do to get me a better plan?

I'm seeing a lot of offers from different providers, better than what i have now here
Can TELUS offer me a better deal than I have now? If not i will have no choice but to switch
I am no longer happy with TELUS, i think it's time i look into other providers
Can you help me out and offer me a good deal so i stay and don't go to another provider?
Is there nothing more you can do? If not i can find another provider
i want to switch to a new provider from TELUS
I was offered a better deal from a competitor and would like to discuss my options with you.
I'd like to discuss an offer that I got from a competitor
another provider is offering me a cheaper plan and I might switch

Is there any chance to get a better deal? Something closer to what i was offered with Fido?? Like not paying anything upfront. I am unsure why after being a long time customer I am offered a better deal to move carriers
Pretty good yourself? I received an offer last night from VirginMobile for a 80 dollar plan with Canada wide calling if I was to switch and I'm thinking about taking it
I've been looking at deals from other companies and wondering what telus can do for us
I am shopping around for a new service provider and wanted to know what deals your offer or promotions you have if I switch service providers
I just received a fantastic offer from fizz mobility, and I was wondering if Telus has fantastic offers too?
There are many promos available, What can you offer me to stay with Telus?
I am being offered a pretty good deal from fizz for my phone plan however before I accept I thought I would give telus the chance to offer me their best plan, as I do like your company
fido is offering me a promo to join them. I think it's better than what I have now and I'm thinking of taking it
I received a promo from fizz to buy me out of my contract, i'm just wondering if there's anything you can offer in return?
I got offered a plan by another provider....
I received a winback offer from fizz to go back to them. I was wondering if you would look at the offer and tell me if it's better than what I have now
I'm thinking of switching to Freedom mobile because they have better deals than telus
I am currently a TELUS mobility customer and have been shopping around for a new phone. I've seen your boxing week deal but I came across a better deal at fizz and I think I'm going to switch
I have a Come Back from fizz promotion available to me, does telus have a better offer?
I was wondering what telus would offer so that I don't leave?
oh actually, my reason for asking was i have an offer from fido 'winback' offer and it's better than what I have now
I've been offered a deal from fizz and since I'm with Telus for almost 6 years, I was wondering if it is something you guys could beat their deal
bell is offering a better deal
fizz is still offering a lower price.
my question is, what is telus going to offer me to stay? My loyalty depends on that
